From the Desk of Justia

Lawyer TikTok: A New Place for You to Grow Your Practice

TikTok may be just what you need to refresh your legal marketing strategy. Read this post to learn more about TikTok and the lawyers using it to help reach their goals.

6 Tips for Marketing Your Personal Injury Practice

While there are general legal marketing practices all lawyers should consider, it is also important to stay up to date on the marketing practices that work for your specific practice area. Check out this post if you are a personal injury attorney hoping to up your marketing game.

6 Key Brand Assets Every Law Firm Should Consider Having

Your brand goes beyond the name by which your law firm or the products and services you offer are recognized. In this post, learn more about how the different elements of your brand, both tangible and intangible, can create a close bond between your law firm, your brand, and your clients.

10 Legal Marketing & Practice Blogs to Follow Today

Whether you need to start from scratch on your law practice marketing plan, revamp your marketing strategy, or simply want to stay up to date on legal marketing trends, here are 10 legal marketing and practice blogs to help you stay ahead of the game.

Lawyer Commercials Round-Up

Want to catch up on some of the most memorable lawyer commercials to hit the airwaves (or the internet) over the past decade? Need a few tips for creating your own commercial? Then, this post is for you.

Clubhouse: A New Social Tool for Lawyers

Clubhouse is a new social network that has achieved accelerated growth in a short time. Whether this is due to its invitation-only exclusivity, the FOMO phenomenon, or simply because it is easy to listen to while multitasking, the fact remains that Clubhouse is becoming both a major social hub and a great tool for increasing exposure.

5 Powerful SEO Tools for Your Law Firm

If you have spent some time in the digital marketing space, you know the importance of Search Engine Optimization (SEO). In this article, we highlight some of our top picks for tools to help you improve your website SEO, as well as gather intelligence on your competitors.

Remarketing Highlights: Facebook Retargeting v. Google Ads Remarketing for Lawyers

If you need a quick comparison of the usefulness of Facebook and Google’s remarketing products for a law firm, or simply need a quick introduction to some things to consider when it comes to remarketing, then check this post out.

Webmaster’s Corner

Markup Optimization for Social Media

Outside of finding your website on the first page of Google, social media is one of the most important ways to market your website. In many ways, social media is the “word-of-mouth” communication of the internet. In this article, we discuss what microbrowsers are and what you need to implement to get your website ready for social sharing.

Justia Amplify, also known as Justia PPC Management, umbrellas a number of different advertising channels known to increase conversions. From Google’s Local Services Ads (LSAs), Google Ads, Bing Ads (PPC), and Facebook Remarketing, our marketing professionals will devise strategies that align with the overall goals and characteristics of your law firm. Justia Amplify also includes a customized client review platform that showcases your photo, practice areas, link to your website, and more.

Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews

Featured Lawyer

Natalie Esposito Capano, Esq.

SADDLE RIVER, NJ

Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews is a system designed for lawyers to provide valuable insight from peers and colleagues personally familiar with the lawyer’s work.

Lawyers who have received reviews will have a badge on their profile showing their Justia Lawyer Rating, a numerical representation of the reviews they have received. Our research shows that the Justia Lawyer Rating Badge is the most used search filter in the Justia Lawyer Directory.

Don’t miss out on your chance to showcase your Justia Lawyer Rating Badge on your websites, blogs, and other properties!

Websites that are not mobile responsive are by nature poorly designed as they don’t provide an optimal user experience. At Justia, all of our designs are responsive and we optimize our websites to ensure a great user experience which leads to higher conversion rates.

JurisPro Expert Witness Directory

JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

Safety Engineering Expert Witness Allowed in Part in Slip and Fall Case

A Safety Engineering Expert Witness was allowed to testify in a hotel slip and fall case despite never having worked in the food services industry.

Electrical Engineering Expert Witness Testimony Not Allowed in House Fire Case

An Electrical Engineering Expert Witness was not allowed to testify as he did not perform any calculations.

Pain Management Expert Witness Testimony Allowed in Drug Distribution Litigation

Plaintiff's Pain Management Expert Witness was allowed to testify on a physician's prescriptions of narcotics to patients.

Law Enforcement Expert Witness Testimony Not Allowed in Carjacking Case

A Law Enforcement Expert Witness was not allowed to testify as she was not a commercial premises security expert.

Learn how to research experts here: JurisPro Expert Witness White Paper
